paper_abstract: A new way to define mesh importance for decimation uses transfer functions and visualizes large simulation data in cases where normal visualization methods are insufficient due to memory limits. Next, a parallel isosurface simplification framework uses an importance pyramid to extract and render the decimated meshes progressively without generating the original surface.
paper_title: Importance-Driven Isosurface Decimation for Visualization of Large Simulation Data Based on OpenCL
